title: It's My Turn Cooking Perfect Christmas Turkey: How To Cook Christmas Dinner
description: Host the perfect Christmas Holiday Celebration for 8-10 persons by having your food, recipes, ingredients and shopping lists prepared in this guide. Includes step-by-step instructions for what to prepare for Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, and Boxing Day three course meals, crudites and cheeseboard courses and more. Based on the author's experience of being everyone else's guest for the last twenty years, following this guide ensures you won't put a foot wrong. Includes the most infallible turkey recipe ever!This guide includes easy-to-print shopping lists you can take off with to the supermarket. No hassle!There are easy instructions for cooking each course, with a total of 3 starters, 3 mains and 3 desserts to make your preparations EASY, less TIME consuming, and COST efficient.Impress without the stress. I created this e-book because I figure after being everyone's guest for the last 20 years (I'm a Christmas orphan - always a guest), when I was asked to do the family Christmas (for another family) this year I wanted it to be perfect. I've seen things, people!Enjoy the guide which can serve for Christmas, Thanksgiving or any major family dinner, and please feed back to me on Amazon by writing a review. I'd especially like to know if you found the shopping lists handy. I find writing shopping lists based on recipes a pesky job, so I hope this has help you all out!Seasons Greetings to all.
author: Lisa McKnight
